Summary: DEF-01: Category filter does not update product listing
Description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to homepage
2. Click “Phones” under CATEGORIES
3. Observe product list
Expected Result:
Only phone products displayed
Actual Result:
All products still visible
Severity: High
Status: Open

Summary: DEF-02: Misleading error message when Name field is empty
Description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add item to cart
2. Click “Place Order”
3. Leave Name empty, fill Credit Card
4. Click “Purchase”
Expected Result:
Alert: “Please fill out Name.”
Actual Result:
Alert: “Please fill out Name and Credit Card.”
Severity: Medium
Status: Open

Summary: DEF-03: Cart does not consolidate duplicate products
Description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add item to cart
2. Click “Place Order”
3. Leave Name empty, fill Credit Card
4. Click “Purchase”
Expected Result:
Alert: “Please fill out Name.”
Actual Result:
Alert: “Please fill out Name and Credit Card.”
Severity: Medium
Status: Open
